metadata.dc:author: González-Palacios, J
Miquel Plaza, J
Boixeda De Miquel, D
Martínez Molina, E
Sanjuán Benito, A
Martín De Argila, C
metadata.dc:description: We present the case of a female patient with atypical gastrointestinal stromal tumor. The young woman presented asymptomatic colonic perforation and showed atypical immunohistochemical findings. The various clinicopathologic characteristics and diagnostic tests, as well as treatment and distinct behavior of these tumors, are discussed.
metadata.dc:title: Tumor estromal colónico de características atípicas.
[Atypical colonic stromal tumor].
